"Esteemed jury, throughout this game, I’ve prioritized trust and strategy. While P5 played hard, they often prioritized self-interest over alliances. I built genuine connections, ensuring fairness even in tough decisions. My loyalty to our group’s integrity never wavered. Eliminating me would reward opportunism over collaboration. I've been direct in my communications, honest in my intentions, and strategic without being unnecessarily deceptive. I ask for your vote based on this balanced approach.
